description.value:
By way of a celestial ancestor or divine intervention, the blood of angels fills your body with a holy potency, granting you a majestic visage and angelic powers when you enter your bloodrage.

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.Uuiu3p982omhMEPj]{Improved Initiative}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.iAbIGhm7T2OK9Brt]{Iron Will}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{Mobility}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.0spsP9ylE3goD3jc]{Mounted Combat}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.liPAO5urMI9chctT]{Ride-By Attack}
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.n250dFlbykAIAg5Z]{Weapon Focus}

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wa0zb2pncesmm9lz]{Bless} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.tkjnm3lw7ni82tag]{Resist Energy} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vqfrp8t0c1lw1jna]{Heroism} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.erndkoe44rgj0lob]{Holy Smite} (16th)
